org.drip.product.credit

Class BondComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.definition.Component
        • org.drip.product.definition.CalibratableComponent
          • org.drip.product.definition.CreditComponent
            • org.drip.product.definition.Bond
              • org.drip.product.credit.BondComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BondProduct, ComponentMarketParamRef

    public class BondComponent
extends Bond
implements BondProduct
    BondComponent is the base class that extends CreditComponent abstract class and implements the functionality behind bonds of all kinds. Bond static data is captured in a set of 11 container classes – BondTSYParams, BondCouponParams, BondNotionalParams, BondFloaterParams, BondCurrencyParams, BondIdentifierParams, BondIRValuationParams, CompCRValParams, BondCFTerminationEvent, BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams, and one EmbeddedOptionSchedule object instance each for the call and the put objects. Each of these parameter set can be set separately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BondComponent.BondCalibrator
      The BondCalibrator implements a calibrator that calibrates the yield, the credit basis, or the Z Spread for the bond given the price input.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer

        NULL_SER_STRING, VERSION

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BondComponent()
      Constructor: Constructs an empty bond object
      BondComponent(byte[] ab)
      Bond de-serialization from input byte array

      JulianDate calcNextCouponDate(JulianDate dt)
      Returns the coupon date for the period subsequent to the specified date
      double calcNextCouponRate(JulianDate dt, ComponentMarketParams mktParams)
      Returns the coupon rate for the period subsequent to the specified date

      • calcBondBasisFromASW

        public double calcBondBasisFromASW(ValuationParams valParams,
                          ComponentMarketParams mktParams,
                          QuotingParams quotingParams,

        dblWorkoutDate - Work-out Date
        dblWorkoutFactor - Work-out Factor
        dblZSpread - Z Spread to Work-out
        Returns:
        Bond Basis from Z Spread to Work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the Bond Basis cannot be calculated

        quotingParams - Quoting Parameters
        dblYield - Yield to Maturity
        Returns:
        Convexity from Yield to Maturity
        Throws:
